title: JK Place
text: J.K.Place is a chain of <a href="Italy">Italian</a> <a href="boutique%20hotel">boutique hotel</a>s with three locations in Paris, <a href="Capri">Capri</a> and <a href="Rome">Rome</a>. The chain was founded in Florence in 2003 by hoteliers Ori Kafri and his father, Jonathan Kafri (the "JK" of JK Place). All three hotels were designed by Florentine architect <a href="Michele%20Bonan">Michele Bonan</a>, and all three have received <a href="Hotel%20rating">Five Star ratings</a>.
